name: Number Wizard (Cinn_Senpai)
description:
In Number Wizard challenge the mighty Number Wizard you will attempt to guess a number that he cannot. If you manage to defeat him, you honorable novice in wizardry, you will truly deserve bragging rights! For this is no ordinary number guessing game for this is NUMBER WIZARD!!!!

This game thought me a couple of new game systems that will certainly be helpful in the future. I've learned how create buttons and script scene changes, which were both relativaly simple. Buttons really just requires the script for the scene change and some inspection setting adjustments. Generating a random was the only complex part in the making of this game, and even so it was just a simple line of code using Random.Range().

I've learned how to:

  • Initiate scene changes
  • Create buttons that issue those changes
  • Use Random.Range();
